title: UNESCO International Geoscience and Geoparks Programme
description: Supports collaborative Earth science projects that translate research into sustainable development and community resilience.

title: UNDP Geoscience for the SDGs Initiative
description: Connects geological expertise with national SDG roadmaps to inform climate adaptation, hazard mitigation, and resource management policies.

title: Geoscience for Society - Geological Society of London
description: Curates case studies showing how Earth scientists advance each SDG, with resources for educators and decision-makers.

title: Group on Earth Observations (GEO) SDG Data Hub
description: Provides open geospatial datasets, indicators, and workflows that countries can use to monitor SDG progress in near real time.

title: Africa Mineral and Energy Resources Observatory for Development
description: Shares geoscience knowledge to guide responsible mineral and energy development aligning with Agenda 2030 across African Union states.

title: USGS Climate Adaptation Science Centers
description: Co-produces actionable science with tribes, cities, and agencies to safeguard ecosystems and communities facing climate-driven hazards.
